Data analysis for comparison-class-2 pilot

```{r}
data.path <- "~/research/comparison-class/mturk/class-elicitation-2/round1/"
d <- read.csv(paste(data.path, "class-elicitation-2-trials.csv", sep = ""))
```

```{r}
d.summary <- d %>%
  select(sub_category, super_category, target, sub_endorsement, super_endorsement) %>%
  gather(key, response, -sub_category, -target, -super_category) %>%
  group_by(key, sub_category, super_category, target) %>%
  multi_boot_standard(column = "response")
```

```{r}
d.summary %>% 
  separate(key, into=c('key', 'd2')) %>%
  select(-d2) %>%
  select(target)
```
